explains: adj. 未被承认的；未被认出的；未被认可的

sentences.en: Hard work and talent so often go unrecognized and unrewarded.
sentences.cn: 勤奋和天赋很容易不被认可也得不到奖励。

sentences.en: It would be tragic if her talent remained unrecognized.
sentences.cn: 若她一直怀才不遇，那就可悲了。

sentences.en: There is the possibility that hypothermia can go unrecognized.
sentences.cn: 体温过低有可能不会被注意到。
